zero.

translation.en: Now that you're here,
you're welcome.
There's one other thing I wanted to talk to you about before I left, um…
translation.es: Hay otra cosa de la que quería hablarte antes de irme.

translation.en: The child that you had, your daughter.
translation.es: La bebé que tuviste, tu hija.

translation.en: Rachel.
She's…
wonderful, she's amazing.
I wanted you to know that.
You know her?
I do know her, um…
Yeah, she wanted to come here, she wanted to meet you in person.
translation.es: Ella quería venir a verte y conocerte.

translation.en: And I think, you know, after… after reading this…
translation.es: Creo que después de leer esto…

translation.en: she felt a connection for sure, and, uh…
she understands everything. Everything.
Thank you for telling me that.
Merry Christmas.
Merry Christmas, Jacob.
And thank you for this.
It's a precious gift.
And, Jake…
if you see my daughter,
would you tell her that if she ever wants to get in touch,
I would like that very much.
Rachel.
Your dad's been working on this since Thanksgiving.
translation.es: Tu papá lleva mucho tiempo trabajando en esto.

translation.en: I can't wait to see it.
I think it's the most beautiful he's ever done.
translation.es: Creo que es lo más hermoso que ha hecho.

translation.en: - Yeah? -
Uh, when will Alan be coming?
Uh, soon. Soon.
- You don't sound too excited, honey. - Well, I am, I just…
translation.es: - No suenas entusiasmada, cariño. - Lo estoy, pero…

translation.en: I don't know, excited is a bit… a strong word.
translation.es: No sé, entusiasmada es una palabra fuerte.

translation.en: I couldn't get it right until finally last night at, like, 2:00 a.m.
translation.es: Recién anoche a las 2:00 a. m., pude lograr terminarlo como quería.

translation.en: No, you got it right, Dad. This is… It's perfect.
I love it. This is… It's perfect. Thank you.
Honey, you don't want to talk to Alan?
No, no, it's not that. It's just that I don't, um…
translation.es: No, no es eso. Es que no…

translation.en: I don't know. Things are… We'll talk later, and it's…
translation.es: No sé. Las cosas están… Hablaremos después.

translation.en: We're sorting things… sorting some things out right now.
Sorting some things out? I thought you guys made up.
No, we-- We did, we just--
You know, things are a little up in the air right now.
translation.es: Las cosas están un poco confusas ahora.

translation.en: This is starting to sound a little like that cigar engagement ring.
translation.es: Esto empieza a sonar como eso del anillo de cigarro.

translation.en: - Dad, stop. Seriously. -
Um, sorry, guys, one sec. I'll be right back.
Jake, you've gotta stop calling. No, I'm not gonna stop calling until we talk.
translation.es: - Jake, deja de llamar. - No hasta que hablemos.

translation.en: I don't want to do this. Okay? I…
So I'm gonna just hang up the phone now.
Please don't try to find me, okay?
Too late.
Why are you doing this?
Do you really have to ask?
I'm not coming out.
I'm not. I can't.
Why? Why not? What are you… What are you afraid of? What's gonna happen?
translation.es: ¿Por qué? ¿Por qué no? ¿A qué le temes? ¿Qué va a suceder?

translation.en: Jake, you don't understand.
You don't. I have finally found something… that I can really…
translation.es: Por fin encontré algo con lo que realmente

translation.en: I can really count on, and…
It may not be perfect, but it's what I want.
translation.es: Puede no ser perfecto, pero es lo que quiero.

translation.en: It's what I need.
Okay?
So I need you to understand that. I do understand. I understand the whole thing.
translation.es: - Necesito que entiendas eso. - Sí. Entiendo todo.

translation.en: I understand that…
what you may have needed before, you don't need anymore.
translation.es: que ya no necesitas lo que necesitabas antes.

translation.en: Look at me, I… All I wanted my entire life was to be alone.
translation.es: Mírame a mí. Lo que siempre quise fue estar solo.

translation.en: And it's hard for people like us to trust, right? To let people in.
translation.es: A la gente como nosotros le cuesta confiar, dejar entrar a otros.

translation.en: It's hard. I understand that. But here I am, right here, right now.
translation.es: Es difícil. Entiendo. Pero yo estoy aquí. Aquí y ahora.

translation.en: And I am standing here with the only friend I have in the entire world.
translation.es: Estoy aquí con la única amiga que tengo en el mundo,

translation.en: I'm staring at the woman that I love,
translation.es: mirando a la mujer que amo.

translation.en: and I'm begging you to trust me. I'm telling you, you can trust me.
translation.es: Y te ruego que confíes en mí. Te digo que puedes confiar en mí.

translation.en: Just let me in, please.
Let me in.
Tell me
you don't love me.
Jake, that's Alan. You gotta go.
You tell me that you don't love me and I'll go.
translation.es: Dime que no me amas, y me iré.

translation.en: I don't love you.
Saw your truck, thought we'd pop by and wish you Merry Christmas.
translation.es: Vi tu camioneta. Vinimos a desearte feliz Navidad.

translation.en: Oh, thank you.
Yes, I was packing up a few things, then I need to lock up, and then take off, so…
translation.es: Estaba empacando algunas cosas. Voy a cerrar, y después me iré.

translation.en: Would you care to join us for dinner? We'd love to have you.
We really would. We're having a few people over.
It's Christmas dinner, all the trimmings.
I would, I would love to, and thank you, but I should take off before the roads get too slick.
translation.es: Me encantaría, pero debo irme antes de que el camino empeore.

translation.en: How did things go with your father?
Um, you know, they… Better than expected. Much better, actually.
translation.es: Mejor de lo esperado. Mucho mejor, de hecho.

translation.en: - I told you. - You did.
And Rachel and her mom?
I think that's gonna work itself out.
That's very good news. Excellent.
Oh, bloody hell, I've gotta go baste the ham. You sure you can't stay?
translation.es: Diablos. Debo glasear el jamón. ¿Seguro no puedes quedarte?

translation.en: Well, Happy Christmas, old boy.
- Happy basting. - I'll be right there.
Come on in.
And you and Rachel?
No? Really? I was so sure.
Well, Kerouac said it.
It all ends in tears, anyway.
But I'll be okay, and Rachel will be okay too.
translation.es: Pero yo estaré bien, y Rachel también.

translation.en: Of course.
Merry Christmas.
For me? What did you do here?
Oh, Ellie…
You put the… tree back in.
Yes.
I have wonderful memories of this house.
translation.es: Tengo recuerdos hermosos de esta casa.

translation.en: You and Benji playing in the yard.
translation.es: Benji y tú jugando en el jardín,

translation.en: Your folks.
Merry Christmas.
- Take care. - Oh, you too. Take care of yourself too.
And thank you. This is just… You're special.
